00025 
00026 class QwtPicker::PrivateData
00027 {
00028 public:
00029     class PickerWidget: public QWidget
00030     {
00031     public:
00032         enum Type
00033         {
00034             RubberBand,
00035             Text
00036         };
00037         PickerWidget(QwtPicker *, QWidget *, Type);
00038         virtual void updateMask();
00039 
00040     protected:
00041         virtual void paintEvent(QPaintEvent *);
00042 
00043         QwtPicker *d_picker;
00044         Type d_type;
00045     };
00046 
00047     bool enabled;
00048 
00049     QwtPickerMachine *stateMachine;
00050 
00051     int selectionFlags;
00052     QwtPicker::ResizeMode resizeMode;
00053 
00054     QwtPicker::RubberBand rubberBand;
00055     QPen rubberBandPen;
00056 
00057     QwtPicker::DisplayMode trackerMode;
00058     QPen trackerPen;
00059     QFont trackerFont;
00060 
00061     QwtPolygon selection;
00062     bool isActive;
00063     QPoint labelPosition;
00064 
00065     bool mouseTracking; // used to save previous value
00066 
00067     /*
00068       On X11 the widget below the picker widgets gets paint events
00069       with a region that is the bounding rect of the mask, if it is complex.
00070       In case of (f.e) a CrossRubberBand and a text this creates complete
00071       repaints of the widget. So we better use two different widgets.
00072      */
00073      
00074 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00075     QGuardedPtr<PickerWidget> rubberBandWidget;
00076     QGuardedPtr<PickerWidget> textLabelWidget;
00077 #else
00078     QPointer<PickerWidget> rubberBandWidget;
00079     QPointer<PickerWidget> textLabelWidget;
00080 #endif
00081 };
00082 
00083 QwtPicker::PrivateData::PickerWidget::PickerWidget(
00084         QwtPicker *picker, QWidget *parent, Type type):
00085     QWidget(parent),
00086     d_picker(picker),
00087     d_type(type)
00088 {
00089 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040000
00090     setAttribute(Qt::WA_TransparentForMouseEvents);
00091     setAttribute(Qt::WA_NoSystemBackground);
00092     setAttribute(Qt::WA_PaintOnScreen);
00093     setFocusPolicy(Qt::NoFocus);
00094 #else
00095     setBackgroundMode(Qt::NoBackground);
00096     setFocusPolicy(QWidget::NoFocus);
00097 #endif
00098     hide();
00099 }
00100 
00101 void QwtPicker::PrivateData::PickerWidget::updateMask()
00102 {
00103     QBitmap bm(width(), height());
00104     bm.fill(Qt::color0);
00105 
00106     QPainter painter(&bm);
00107 
00108     if ( d_type == RubberBand )
00109     {
00110         QPen pen = d_picker->rubberBandPen();
00111         pen.setColor(Qt::color1);
00112         painter.setPen(pen);
00113 
00114         d_picker->drawRubberBand(&painter);
00115     }
00116     if ( d_type == Text )
00117     {
00118         QPen pen = d_picker->trackerPen();
00119         pen.setColor(Qt::color1);
00120         painter.setPen(pen);
00121 
00122         d_picker->drawTracker(&painter);
00123     }
00124 
00125     painter.end();
00126 
00127 
00128 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00129     QWidget *w = parentWidget();
00130     const bool doUpdate = w->isUpdatesEnabled();
00131     const Qt::BackgroundMode bgMode = w->backgroundMode();
00132     w->setUpdatesEnabled(false);
00133     if ( bgMode != Qt::NoBackground )
00134         w->setBackgroundMode(Qt::NoBackground);
00135 #endif
00136 
00137     const QRegion r(bm);
00138     setMask(r);
00139 
00140 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00141     if ( bgMode != Qt::NoBackground )
00142         w->setBackgroundMode(bgMode);
00143 
00144     w->setUpdatesEnabled(doUpdate);
00145 #endif
00146 
00147     setShown(!r.isEmpty());
00148 }
00149 
00150 void QwtPicker::PrivateData::PickerWidget::paintEvent(QPaintEvent *e)
00151 {
00152     QPainter painter(this);
00153 
00154     if ( d_type == RubberBand )
00155     {
00156         painter.setClipRegion(e->region());
00157         painter.setPen(d_picker->rubberBandPen());
00158         d_picker->drawRubberBand(&painter);
00159     }
00160 
00161     if ( d_type == Text )
00162     {
00163         painter.setClipRegion(e->region());
00164 #if 0
00165         painter.setPen(d_picker->trackerPen());
00166         d_picker->drawTracker(&painter);
00167 #else
00168         painter.fillRect(e->rect(), QBrush(d_picker->trackerPen().color()));
00169 #endif
00170     }
00171 }

00197 QwtPicker::QwtPicker(int selectionFlags, RubberBand rubberBand,

00205 QwtPicker::~QwtPicker()
00206 {
00207     setMouseTracking(false);
00208     delete d_data->stateMachine;
00209     delete d_data->rubberBandWidget;
00210     delete d_data->textLabelWidget;
00211     delete d_data;
00212 }
00213 
00215 void QwtPicker::init(QWidget *parent, int selectionFlags, 
00216     RubberBand rubberBand, DisplayMode trackerMode)
00217 {
00218     d_data = new PrivateData;
00219 
00220     d_data->rubberBandWidget = NULL;
00221     d_data->textLabelWidget = NULL;
00222 
00223     d_data->rubberBand = rubberBand;
00224     d_data->enabled = false;
00225     d_data->resizeMode = Stretch;
00226     d_data->trackerMode = AlwaysOff;
00227     d_data->isActive = false;
00228     d_data->labelPosition = QPoint(-1, -1);
00229     d_data->mouseTracking = false;
00230 
00231     d_data->stateMachine = NULL;
00232     setSelectionFlags(selectionFlags);
00233 
00234     if ( parent )
00235     {
00236 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040000
00237         if ( parent->focusPolicy() == Qt::NoFocus )
00238             parent->setFocusPolicy(Qt::WheelFocus);
00239 #else
00240         if ( parent->focusPolicy() == QWidget::NoFocus )
00241             parent->setFocusPolicy(QWidget::WheelFocus);
00242 #endif
00243 
00244         d_data->trackerFont = parent->font();
00245         d_data->mouseTracking = parent->hasMouseTracking();
00246         setEnabled(true);
00247     }
00248     setTrackerMode(trackerMode);
00249 }
00250 
00254 void QwtPicker::setStateMachine(QwtPickerMachine *stateMachine)
00255 {
00256     if ( d_data->stateMachine != stateMachine )
00257     {
00258         if ( isActive() )
00259             end(false);
00260 
00261         delete d_data->stateMachine;
00262         d_data->stateMachine = stateMachine;
00263 
00264         if ( d_data->stateMachine )
00265             d_data->stateMachine->reset();
00266     }
00267 }
00268 
00285 QwtPickerMachine *QwtPicker::stateMachine(int flags) const
00286 {
00287     if ( flags & PointSelection )
00288     {
00289         if ( flags & ClickSelection )
00290             return new QwtPickerClickPointMachine;
00291         else
00292             return new QwtPickerDragPointMachine;
00293     }
00294     if ( flags & RectSelection )
00295     {
00296         if ( flags & ClickSelection )
00297             return new QwtPickerClickRectMachine;
00298         else
00299             return new QwtPickerDragRectMachine;
00300     }
00301     if ( flags & PolygonSelection )
00302     {
00303         return new QwtPickerPolygonMachine();
00304     }
00305     return NULL;
00306 }

00312     if ( obj && obj->isWidgetType() )
00313         return (QWidget *)obj;
00314 
00315     return NULL;
00316 }

00325     return NULL;

00447 void QwtPicker::setEnabled(bool enabled)
00448 {
00449     if ( d_data->enabled != enabled )
00450     {
00451         d_data->enabled = enabled;
00452 
00453         QWidget *w = parentWidget();
00454         if ( w )
00455         {
00456             if ( enabled )
00457                 w->installEventFilter(this);
00458             else
00459                 w->removeEventFilter(this);
00460         }
00461 
00462         updateDisplay();
00463     }
00464 }

00548 
00562 QwtText QwtPicker::trackerText(const QPoint &pos) const
00563 {
00564     QString label;
00565 
00566     switch(rubberBand())
00567     {
00568         case HLineRubberBand:
00569             label.sprintf("%d", pos.y());
00570             break;
00571         case VLineRubberBand:
00572             label.sprintf("%d", pos.x());
00573             break;
00574         default:
00575             label.sprintf("%d, %d", pos.x(), pos.y());
00576     }
00577     return label;
00578 }
00579 
00588 void QwtPicker::drawRubberBand(QPainter *painter) const
00589 {
00590     if ( !isActive() || rubberBand() == NoRubberBand || 
00591         rubberBandPen().style() == Qt::NoPen )
00592     {
00593         return;
00594     }
00595 
00596     const QRect &pRect = pickRect();
00597     const QwtPolygon &pa = d_data->selection;
00598 
00599     if ( selectionFlags() & PointSelection )
00600     {
00601         if ( pa.count() < 1 )
00602             return;
00603 
00604         const QPoint pos = pa[0];
00605 
00606         switch(rubberBand())
00607         {
00608             case VLineRubberBand:
00609                 QwtPainter::drawLine(painter, pos.x(),
00610                     pRect.top(), pos.x(), pRect.bottom());
00611                 break;
00612 
00613             case HLineRubberBand:
00614                 QwtPainter::drawLine(painter, pRect.left(), 
00615                     pos.y(), pRect.right(), pos.y());
00616                 break;
00617 
00618             case CrossRubberBand:
00619                 QwtPainter::drawLine(painter, pos.x(),
00620                     pRect.top(), pos.x(), pRect.bottom());
00621                 QwtPainter::drawLine(painter, pRect.left(), 
00622                     pos.y(), pRect.right(), pos.y());
00623                 break;
00624             default:
00625                 break;
00626         }
00627     }
00628 
00629     else if ( selectionFlags() & RectSelection )
00630     {
00631         if ( pa.count() < 2 )
00632             return;
00633 
00634         QPoint p1 = pa[0];
00635         QPoint p2 = pa[int(pa.count() - 1)];
00636 
00637         if ( selectionFlags() & CenterToCorner )
00638         {
00639             p1.setX(p1.x() - (p2.x() - p1.x()));
00640             p1.setY(p1.y() - (p2.y() - p1.y()));
00641         }
00642         else if ( selectionFlags() & CenterToRadius )
00643         {
00644             const int radius = qwtMax(qwtAbs(p2.x() - p1.x()), 
00645                 qwtAbs(p2.y() - p1.y()));
00646             p2.setX(p1.x() + radius);
00647             p2.setY(p1.y() + radius);
00648             p1.setX(p1.x() - radius);
00649             p1.setY(p1.y() - radius);
00650         }
00651 
00652 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00653         const QRect rect = QRect(p1, p2).normalize();
00654 #else
00655         const QRect rect = QRect(p1, p2).normalized();
00656 #endif
00657         switch(rubberBand())
00658         {
00659             case EllipseRubberBand:
00660                 QwtPainter::drawEllipse(painter, rect);
00661                 break;
00662             case RectRubberBand:
00663                 QwtPainter::drawRect(painter, rect);
00664                 break;
00665             default:
00666                 break;
00667         }
00668     }
00669     else if ( selectionFlags() & PolygonSelection )
00670     {
00671         if ( rubberBand() == PolygonRubberBand )
00672             painter->drawPolyline(pa);
00673     }
00674 }
00675 
00683 void QwtPicker::drawTracker(QPainter *painter) const
00684 {
00685     const QRect textRect = trackerRect(painter);
00686     if ( !textRect.isEmpty() )
00687     {
00688         QwtText label = trackerText(d_data->labelPosition);
00689         if ( !label.isEmpty() )
00690             label.draw(painter, textRect);
00691     }
00692 }
00693 
00694 QRect QwtPicker::trackerRect(QPainter *painter) const
00695 {
00696     if ( trackerMode() == AlwaysOff || 
00697         (trackerMode() == ActiveOnly && !isActive() ) )
00698     {
00699         return QRect();
00700     }
00701 
00702     if ( d_data->labelPosition.x() < 0 || d_data->labelPosition.y() < 0 )
00703         return QRect();
00704 
00705     QwtText text = trackerText(d_data->labelPosition);
00706     if ( text.isEmpty() )
00707         return QRect();
00708 
00709     QRect textRect(QPoint(0, 0), text.textSize(painter->font()));
00710 
00711     const QPoint &pos = d_data->labelPosition;
00712 
00713     int alignment = 0;
00714     if ( isActive() && d_data->selection.count() > 1 
00715         && rubberBand() != NoRubberBand )
00716     {
00717         const QPoint last = 
00718             d_data->selection[int(d_data->selection.count()) - 2];
00719 
00720         alignment |= (pos.x() >= last.x()) ? Qt::AlignRight : Qt::AlignLeft;
00721         alignment |= (pos.y() > last.y()) ? Qt::AlignBottom : Qt::AlignTop;
00722     }
00723     else
00724         alignment = Qt::AlignTop | Qt::AlignRight;
00725 
00726     const int margin = 5;
00727 
00728     int x = pos.x();
00729     if ( alignment & Qt::AlignLeft )
00730         x -= textRect.width() + margin;
00731     else if ( alignment & Qt::AlignRight )
00732         x += margin;
00733 
00734     int y = pos.y();
00735     if ( alignment & Qt::AlignBottom )
00736         y += margin;
00737     else if ( alignment & Qt::AlignTop )
00738         y -= textRect.height() + margin;
00739     
00740     textRect.moveTopLeft(QPoint(x, y));
00741 
00742     int right = qwtMin(textRect.right(), pickRect().right() - margin);
00743     int bottom = qwtMin(textRect.bottom(), pickRect().bottom() - margin);
00744     textRect.moveBottomRight(QPoint(right, bottom));
00745 
00746     int left = qwtMax(textRect.left(), pickRect().left() + margin);
00747     int top = qwtMax(textRect.top(), pickRect().top() + margin);
00748     textRect.moveTopLeft(QPoint(left, top));
00749 
00750     return textRect;
00751 }
00752 
00765 bool QwtPicker::eventFilter(QObject *o, QEvent *e)
00766 {
00767     if ( o && o == parentWidget() )
00768     {
00769         switch(e->type())
00770         {
00771             case QEvent::Resize:
00772             {
00773                 const QResizeEvent *re = (QResizeEvent *)e;
00774                 if ( d_data->resizeMode == Stretch )
00775                     stretchSelection(re->oldSize(), re->size());
00776 
00777                 if ( d_data->rubberBandWidget )
00778                     d_data->rubberBandWidget->resize(re->size());
00779              
00780                 if ( d_data->textLabelWidget )
00781                     d_data->textLabelWidget->resize(re->size());
00782                 break;
00783             }
00784             case QEvent::MouseButtonPress:
00785                 widgetMousePressEvent((QMouseEvent *)e);
00786                 break;
00787             case QEvent::MouseButtonRelease:
00788                 widgetMouseReleaseEvent((QMouseEvent *)e);
00789                 break;
00790             case QEvent::MouseButtonDblClick:
00791                 widgetMouseDoubleClickEvent((QMouseEvent *)e);
00792                 break;
00793             case QEvent::MouseMove:
00794                 widgetMouseMoveEvent((QMouseEvent *)e);
00795                 break;
00796             case QEvent::KeyPress:
00797                 widgetKeyPressEvent((QKeyEvent *)e);
00798                 break;
00799             case QEvent::KeyRelease:
00800                 widgetKeyReleaseEvent((QKeyEvent *)e);
00801                 break;
00802             case QEvent::Wheel:
00803                 widgetWheelEvent((QWheelEvent *)e);
00804                 break;
00805             default:
00806                 break;
00807         }
00808     }
00809     return false;
00810 }
00811 
00822 void QwtPicker::widgetMousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *e)
00823 {
00824     transition(e);
00825 }
00826 
00836 void QwtPicker::widgetMouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *e)
00837 {
00838     if ( pickRect().contains(e->pos()) )
00839         d_data->labelPosition = e->pos();
00840     else
00841         d_data->labelPosition = QPoint(-1, -1);
00842 
00843     if ( !isActive() )
00844         updateDisplay();
00845 
00846     transition(e);
00847 }
00848 
00859 void QwtPicker::widgetMouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *e)
00860 {
00861     transition(e);
00862 }
00863 
00873 void QwtPicker::widgetMouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent *me)
00874 {
00875     transition(me);
00876 }
00877     
00878 
00888 void QwtPicker::widgetWheelEvent(QWheelEvent *e)
00889 {
00890     if ( pickRect().contains(e->pos()) )
00891         d_data->labelPosition = e->pos();
00892     else
00893         d_data->labelPosition = QPoint(-1, -1);
00894 
00895     updateDisplay();
00896 
00897     transition(e);
00898 }
00899 
00913 void QwtPicker::widgetKeyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *ke)
00914 {
00915     int dx = 0;
00916     int dy = 0;
00917 
00918     int offset = 1;
00919     if ( ke->isAutoRepeat() )
00920         offset = 5;
00921 
00922     if ( keyMatch(KeyLeft, ke) )
00923         dx = -offset;
00924     else if ( keyMatch(KeyRight, ke) )
00925         dx = offset;
00926     else if ( keyMatch(KeyUp, ke) )
00927         dy = -offset;
00928     else if ( keyMatch(KeyDown, ke) )
00929         dy = offset;
00930     else if ( keyMatch(KeyAbort, ke) )
00931     {
00932         if ( d_data->stateMachine )
00933             d_data->stateMachine->reset();
00934 
00935         if (isActive())
00936             end(false);
00937     }
00938     else
00939         transition(ke);
00940 
00941     if ( dx != 0 || dy != 0 )
00942     {
00943         const QRect rect = pickRect();
00944         const QPoint pos = parentWidget()->mapFromGlobal(QCursor::pos());
00945 
00946         int x = pos.x() + dx;
00947         x = qwtMax(rect.left(), x);
00948         x = qwtMin(rect.right(), x);
00949 
00950         int y = pos.y() + dy;
00951         y = qwtMax(rect.top(), y);
00952         y = qwtMin(rect.bottom(), y);
00953 
00954         QCursor::setPos(parentWidget()->mapToGlobal(QPoint(x, y)));
00955     }
00956 }
00957  
00967 void QwtPicker::widgetKeyReleaseEvent(QKeyEvent *ke)
00968 {
00969     transition(ke);
00970 }
00971 
00979 void QwtPicker::transition(const QEvent *e)
00980 {
00981     if ( !d_data->stateMachine )
00982         return;
00983 
00984     QwtPickerMachine::CommandList commandList =
00985         d_data->stateMachine->transition(*this, e);
00986 
00987     QPoint pos;
00988     switch(e->type())
00989     {
00990         case QEvent::MouseButtonDblClick:
00991         case QEvent::MouseButtonPress:
00992         case QEvent::MouseButtonRelease:
00993         case QEvent::MouseMove:
00994         {
00995             const QMouseEvent *me = (QMouseEvent *)e;
00996             pos = me->pos();
00997             break;
00998         }
00999         default:
01000             pos = parentWidget()->mapFromGlobal(QCursor::pos());
01001     }
01002 
01003     for ( uint i = 0; i < (uint)commandList.count(); i++ )
01004     {
01005         switch(commandList[i])
01006         {
01007             case QwtPickerMachine::Begin:
01008             {
01009                 begin();
01010                 break;
01011             }
01012             case QwtPickerMachine::Append:
01013             {
01014                 append(pos);
01015                 break;
01016             }
01017             case QwtPickerMachine::Move:
01018             {
01019                 move(pos);
01020                 break;
01021             }
01022             case QwtPickerMachine::End:
01023             {
01024                 end();
01025                 break;
01026             }
01027         }
01028     }
01029 }
01030 
01036 void QwtPicker::begin()
01037 {
01038     if ( d_data->isActive )
01039         return;
01040 
01041     d_data->selection.resize(0);
01042     d_data->isActive = true;
01043 
01044     if ( trackerMode() != AlwaysOff )
01045     {
01046         if ( d_data->labelPosition.x() < 0 || d_data->labelPosition.y() < 0 ) 
01047         {
01048             QWidget *w = parentWidget();
01049             if ( w )
01050                 d_data->labelPosition = w->mapFromGlobal(QCursor::pos());
01051         }
01052     }
01053 
01054     updateDisplay();
01055     setMouseTracking(true);
01056 }
01057 
01068 bool QwtPicker::end(bool ok)
01069 {
01070     if ( d_data->isActive )
01071     {
01072         setMouseTracking(false);
01073 
01074         d_data->isActive = false;
01075 
01076         if ( trackerMode() == ActiveOnly )
01077             d_data->labelPosition = QPoint(-1, -1);
01078 
01079         if ( ok )
01080             ok = accept(d_data->selection);
01081 
01082         if ( ok )
01083             emit selected(d_data->selection);
01084         else
01085             d_data->selection.resize(0);
01086 
01087         updateDisplay();
01088     }
01089     else
01090         ok = false;
01091 
01092     return ok;
01093 }
01094 
01103 void QwtPicker::append(const QPoint &pos)
01104 {
01105     if ( d_data->isActive )
01106     {
01107         const int idx = d_data->selection.count();
01108         d_data->selection.resize(idx + 1);
01109         d_data->selection[idx] = pos;
01110 
01111         updateDisplay();
01112 
01113         emit appended(pos);
01114     }
01115 }
01116 
01125 void QwtPicker::move(const QPoint &pos)
01126 {
01127     if ( d_data->isActive )
01128     {
01129         const int idx = d_data->selection.count() - 1;
01130         if ( idx >= 0 )
01131         {
01132             if ( d_data->selection[idx] != pos )
01133             {
01134                 d_data->selection[idx] = pos;
01135 
01136                 updateDisplay();
01137 
01138                 emit moved(pos);
01139             }
01140         }
01141     }
01142 }
01143 
01144 bool QwtPicker::accept(QwtPolygon &) const
01145 {
01146     return true;
01147 }
01148 
01153 bool QwtPicker::isActive() const 
01154 {
01155     return d_data->isActive;
01156 }
01157 
01159 const QwtPolygon &QwtPicker::selection() const
01160 {
01161     return d_data->selection;
01162 }
01163 
01173 void QwtPicker::stretchSelection(const QSize &oldSize, const QSize &newSize)
01174 {
01175     const double xRatio =
01176         double(newSize.width()) / double(oldSize.width());
01177     const double yRatio =
01178         double(newSize.height()) / double(oldSize.height());
01179 
01180     for ( int i = 0; i < int(d_data->selection.count()); i++ )
01181     {
01182         QPoint &p = d_data->selection[i];
01183         p.setX(qRound(p.x() * xRatio));
01184         p.setY(qRound(p.y() * yRatio));
01185 
01186         emit changed(d_data->selection);
01187     }
01188 }
01189 
01203 void QwtPicker::setMouseTracking(bool enable)
01204 {
01205     QWidget *widget = parentWidget();
01206     if ( !widget )
01207         return;
01208 
01209     if ( enable )
01210     {
01211         d_data->mouseTracking = widget->hasMouseTracking();
01212         widget->setMouseTracking(true);
01213     }
01214     else
01215     {
01216         widget->setMouseTracking(d_data->mouseTracking);
01217     }
01218 }
01219 
01225 QRect QwtPicker::pickRect() const
01226 {
01227     QRect rect;
01228 
01229     const QWidget *widget = parentWidget();
01230     if ( !widget )
01231         return rect;
01232 
01233     if ( widget->inherits("QFrame") )
01234         rect = ((QFrame *)widget)->contentsRect();
01235     else
01236         rect = widget->rect();
01237 
01238     return rect;
01239 }
01240 
01241 void QwtPicker::updateDisplay()
01242 {
01243     QWidget *w = parentWidget();
01244 
01245     bool showRubberband = false;
01246     bool showTracker = false;
01247     if ( w && w->isVisible() && d_data->enabled )
01248     {
01249         if ( rubberBand() != NoRubberBand && isActive() &&
01250             rubberBandPen().style() != Qt::NoPen )
01251         {
01252             showRubberband = true;
01253         }
01254 
01255         if ( trackerMode() == AlwaysOn ||
01256             (trackerMode() == ActiveOnly && isActive() ) )
01257         {
01258             if ( trackerPen() != Qt::NoPen )
01259                 showTracker = true;
01260         }
01261     }
01262 
01263 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
01264     QGuardedPtr<PrivateData::PickerWidget> &rw = d_data->rubberBandWidget;
01265 #else
01266     QPointer<PrivateData::PickerWidget> &rw = d_data->rubberBandWidget;
01267 #endif
01268     if ( showRubberband )
01269     {
01270         if ( rw.isNull() )
01271         {
01272             rw = new PrivateData::PickerWidget(
01273                 this, w, PrivateData::PickerWidget::RubberBand);
01274             rw->resize(w->size());
01275         }
01276         rw->updateMask();
01277     }
01278     else
01279         delete rw;
01280 
01281 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
01282     QGuardedPtr<PrivateData::PickerWidget> &tw = d_data->textLabelWidget;
01283 #else
01284     QPointer<PrivateData::PickerWidget> &tw = d_data->textLabelWidget;
01285 #endif
01286     if ( showTracker )
01287     {
01288         if ( tw.isNull() )
01289         {
01290             tw = new PrivateData::PickerWidget(
01291                 this, w, PrivateData::PickerWidget::Text);
01292             tw->resize(w->size());
01293         }
01294         tw->updateMask();
01295     }
01296     else
01297         delete tw;
01298 }
